duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide legal support related to bankruptcy, mortgage/real estate, Qui Tam, and Information Law.
Draft and review legislation, regulations, and Congressional testimony.
Assist in litigation support and legal research projects.
Review transactional documents including mortgage servicing, title packages, condominium projects, and bankruptcy matters.
Work closely with stakeholders across Government, including the White House, Congress, and other federal agencies.
Perform duties in numerous geographic locations.

education_certification.credential: Unrestricted license to practice law in a State
